sentences.en: " A new phase in the history of Russia begins "
sentences.cn: “ 俄国历史的新阶段开始了 ”

sentences.en: " Name the Czars of Russia, " he barked.
sentences.cn: “ 说出沙皇的名字! ” 他吼道.

sentences.en: After a year and a half of war Russia was defeated.
sentences.cn: 一年半的战争之后俄国被击败了.

sentences.en: Alaska was once possessed by Russia.
sentences.cn: 阿拉斯加一度曾是俄国的领土.

sentences.en: All these ligneous plants are imported from Russia.
sentences.cn: 这些木本植物都是从俄国进口而来。

sentences.en: At least for Russia, that it is.
sentences.cn: 至少对于俄罗斯是这样的。

sentences.en: England and France fought against Russia in the Crimean War.
sentences.cn: 在克里米亚战争中,英、法两国与俄国作战.

sentences.en: He cautioned that the Russia - American discussions were still in an exploratory stage.
sentences.cn: 他警告说俄美会谈尚处于探索阶段.

sentences.en: He was doubling for America and Russia.
sentences.cn: 他给美国和俄罗斯当双重间谍。

sentences.en: His apartment was the most famous literary salon in Russia.
sentences.cn: 他的公寓是俄国最著名的文学沙龙会所。

sentences.en: Our goal continues to be to send a clear message to Russia, or others, not to do this to us.
sentences.cn: 我们的目标是向俄罗斯或其他人发出一个明确的信息，即不要对我们做这样的事。

sentences.en: Russia was pushing down through Manchuria to Corea.
sentences.cn: 俄国正通过满洲向朝鲜推进.

sentences.en: So much homage at least the world paid to Russia.
sentences.cn: 于是,不管怎么样,世人还是向俄国表示高度敬意.

sentences.en: That transmitter was beamed at Russia.
sentences.cn: 那台发射机曾用于对俄罗斯广播。

sentences.en: the abolition of serfdom in Russia in 1861
sentences.cn: 1861年农奴制在俄国的废除

sentences.en: The emperor of Russia Peter I was given the appellation " the Great ".
sentences.cn: 俄皇彼得一世被加上了 “ 大帝 ” 的称号.

sentences.en: The middle decades of the 19th century marked a watershed in Russia's history.
sentences.cn: 19世纪中叶标志着俄国历史的转折点。

sentences.en: TheThey executed Russia's imperial family in 1918.
sentences.cn: 他们1918年处死了俄国沙皇皇族。

sentences.en: They executed Russia's imperial family in 1918.
sentences.cn: 他们1918年处死了俄国沙皇皇族。

sentences.en: This program is beamed at Russia.
sentences.cn: 这套节目是对俄罗斯广播的。

trans.tran_cn: (1917年以前的)俄罗斯帝国，现俄罗斯，俄罗斯皮革
